classical.hd_quote: The potential for centering through attunement to challenges.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Acts without personal agenda; meets challenge with centered presence.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Performs ‘selflessness’ for recognition; virtue-signaling under stress.

lines.group_role: quiet moral center / attunement under challenge

classical.hd_quote: The innocence of the Self and its protection can only be maintained in the now.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Embodies pure presence; protects innocence by staying in the moment.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Loses innocence when others project motives or rewards onto them.

lines.group_role: presence anchor / guardian of the now

classical.hd_quote: The power of the spirit to withstand failure and shock.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Maintains innocence through failures; learns through shocks without bitterness.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Cynicism after shocks; conflates innocence with guaranteed success.

classical.hd_quote: The spiritual warrior, the innocence maintained regardless of circumstances.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Holds steady, modeling motiveless purity regardless of surrounding chaos.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Rigid moral posturing; uses ‘innocence’ to shame others.

classical.hd_quote: The power of the spirit to heal and be healed.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Withdraws from conditioning to recover innocence; midwife for others’ restoration.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Hypochondria; seeks healing from others instead of deconditioning.

classical.hd_quote: The loss of innocence through inappropriate action, or Constant inappropriate action in times of challenge that can break the spirit.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Discriminates action: purity of deed must match purity of heart.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Detached idealism; inaction from fear of ‘wrong’ action.

lines.group_role: guardian of right action / long-view ethicist

meta.provenance: hd_quote lines are exact (<25 words) from Ra Uru Hu (Line Companion) / Complete Rave I’Ching via Archive.org.
